meanings.definition: A person who is in prison or has a criminal record.
meanings.sent1: The gaolbirds were escorted back to their cells after the visitation hours.
meanings.sent2: The gaolbirds were known to the townspeople as troublemakers.
meanings.sent3: The gaolbirds tried to organize a talent show in the prison yard.
meanings.sent4: The gaolbirds' past mistakes followed them like shadows.
meanings.sent5: The gaolbirds' orange jumpsuits made them stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who have been incarcerated for committing crimes.
meanings.sent1: The gaolbirds gathered in the prison yard during recreation time.
meanings.sent2: The gaolbirds shared stories of their past crimes in the common area.
meanings.sent3: The gaolbirds attempted to bake a cake with limited ingredients.
meanings.sent4: The gaolbirds' unity behind bars was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The gaolbirds' freedom was a distant dream behind bars.
